name: Sensual Adventures - Episode 7
description:
Puppetmaster returns with not just one but two new episodes of Sensual Adventures. Sensual Adventures Episode 7 The Dealer comes in two versions: the girl version and the guy version. This bundles will let you purchase both at a discount. The girl version features 29 minutes of runtime, 15 positions, and 3 cumshot, while the guy version features 28 minutes of runtime, 13 postions, and 1 cumshot.

Sensual Adventures Episode 7 takes place 4 years before the start of Episode 1, a time when the girls had only just met and were starting both their adventures and their tumultuous relationship together. As dickgirls, the girls are always ready to fuck and have a habit of finding their way into bed with anyone and everyone… even the enemy.

Features:
  • Both versions in one package!
  • Girl on Girl (Alexandra & Livia)
  • Futa on Girl Version (Brittany, Trinity, Livia)
  • Guy on Futa (Richard, Brittany, Trinity)
  • Basic character customization
  • Pre-simulated Cumshots
  • Vastly improved graphics compared to EP5&6

Please note: this are real-time Episodes with basic customization. Nothing more, nothing less. Just to be very clear about that ;)
